my_business: Hi, I am Dr Anand, founder of The Roots Unisex Salon Spa and Ayurveda. Our commitment is to make the largest multi-chain franchise model in India in the coming years, which we are really excited about. We have been a trendsetter in the beauty industry for over a decade. We are a team of experts from different states with diverse languages and cultures. At The Roots, we come together to offer differentiated and innovative services. Our uniqueness is our strength, our truth, and our beauty services are exceptional.
